author: axic3354
content: Thatâ€™s correct, but if I understand correctly, it is still not possible to overwrite existing code (see https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-689-address-collision-of-contract-address-causes-exceptional-halt/3542/3). If an account is self-destructed, code can be placed again via create2. However that section in the merkleization doc says that upon selfdestruct code is removed, and thus allows for reinsertion via create2, i.e. it can work correctly.

author: axic3354
content: Whenever I find the time I really want to sort out that missing clarification linked above, there are numerous issues on the EIP repo regarding to it.
